授業目的: The purpose of this course is to provide students affluent opportunities to discuss their thoughts and ideas in English. For this purpose, movies produced by a Japanese animation film production company, Studio Ghibli, will be used as the primary course materials. Because their movies have been very popular for many years over different generations in the world, it is assumed that many of you have already been familiar with the stories and contents. Having that powerful schemata, you will be able to focus on the contents and enjoy talking and about them in English. This can facilitates your English use greatly and contribute to further development of your English skills.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to understand possible key ideas of Ghibli movies in English.
2. You will be able to exchanged your thoughts and ideas about the movies with other students.
3. You will be able to express your thoughts in forms of presentations and essays.
授業方法:
- When possible, the course might be switched to in-person class later in the semester.
- In-class zoom will be available for those who're officially permitted to keep participating online throughout the semester.
- The course materials will be provided as PDFs.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for discussions and presentations weekly.
